setFontColor

public void setFontColor(int nFontColor)
set font color.

Specified by:
setFontColor in interface voSubTitleFormatSetting
Parameters:
nFontColor - the font color for text

setFontOpacity

public void setFontOpacity(int nAlpha)
set font color opacity rate.

Specified by:
setFontOpacity in interface voSubTitleFormatSetting
Parameters:
nAlpha - the font color opacity rate, it is between 0 and 100, 0 is transparent, 100 is opacity

setFontSize

public void setFontSize(float nSmallFontSize,
                        float nMediumFontSize,
                        float nLargeFontSzie)
set font size, it will be delete, and it will be replaced with setFontSize(float nFontSize).

Parameters:
nSmallFontSize - the small font size for text, the parameter value is between 0.5 and 2.0, 0.5 is the smallest, 2.0 is the biggest font.
nMediumFontSize - the medium font size for text, the parameter value is between 0.5 and 2.0, 0.5 is the smallest, 2.0 is the biggest font.
nLargeFontSzie - the large font size for text, the parameter value is between 0.5 and 2.0, 0.5 is the smallest, 2.0 is the biggest font.

setFontSizeScale

public void setFontSizeScale(int nFontSize)
set font size scale.

Specified by:
setFontSizeScale in interface voSubTitleFormatSetting
Parameters:
nFontSize - the font size scale for text, the parameter value is between 50 and 200, 50 is the smallest and is the 0.5 times of default font size, 200 is the biggest font and is the 2.0 times of default font size.

setFontSize

public void setFontSize(float nFontSize)
set font size scale, it will replaced with setFontSizeScale.

Parameters:
nFontSize - the font size for text, the parameter value is between 0.5 and 2.0, 0.5 is the smallest, 2.0 is the biggest font.

setFontStyle

public void setFontStyle(int style)
set font style, same as setFontName.

Specified by:

    reset

    public void reset()
    Reset all parameters to default status. Subtitle will be presented as subtitle stream specified, instead of user specified

    Specified by:
    reset in interface voSubTitleFormatSetting
